messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: Hello!
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Tama! Glad to have you here! I hope we don t make you feel too much like you ve thrown yourself to the wolves (pun intended) with all our questions! LOL!
messages.messageBody:
Hello Tama! Glad to have you here! I hope we don't make you feel too much like you've thrown yourself to the wolves (pun intended) with all our questions! LOL!

Seriously, any light you can shed on any topic would be greatly appreciated! Especially where that evil carp is concerned!

-MissBehavin (Still believes the Babelfish is an Ishin plot.)

messages.subject: Re: Hello!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Tama, Welcome aboard! I m glad you are finally posting. It s always good to have Japanese member on board! It is always a pleasure to have an insider ... I
messages.messageBody:
Hi Tama,

Welcome aboard! I'm glad you are finally posting. It's always good to
have Japanese member on board! It is always a pleasure to have
an "insider"... I hope you enjoy your stay with us.

~wounds

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Hello!
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome Tama! I m so  happy you decided  to join us and post! You guys, Tama has _seen_ the Shinsengumi exhibit in Tokyo and has many interesting things to
messages.messageBody:
Welcome Tama!

I'm so happy you decided to join us and post!

You guys, Tama has _seen_ the Shinsengumi exhibit in Tokyo and has many
interesting things to share. This is the person who was so kind to
share the Hijikata singing clip that I watch and listen to each and
every day.

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Hello!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! *hugs* welcome! I m not that active posting either (hehe there are people who knows a lot more than me here...) so don t feel bad, I think that we all will
messages.messageBody:
Hi!
*hugs*
welcome! I'm not that active posting either (hehe there are people who knows a lot more than me here...) so don't feel bad, I think that we all will enjoy your contributions a lot!!
Hope you have a good time in the ML as we all do.
Take care
Firuze
----- Original Message -----
From: ktamae@...
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 2004 10:45 PM
Subject: [SHQ] Hello!


Hello everyone!
I'm a Japanese SHQ member who have just read your comments till now, and
filnaly I try to post for the first time.
As I'm now in abroad I haven't any books about Shinsengumi with me, so I
could give only limited informations, nevertheless I 'd like to contribute to your
research.
I mention also that I became a big fan of NHK drama "Shinsengumi " this year
and my interest in Shinsengumi increased.

Sincerely yours

Tama

messages.subject: Hello!
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone! I m a Japanese SHQ member who have just read your comments till now, and filnaly I try to post for the first time. As I m now in abroad I
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone!
I'm a Japanese SHQ member who have just read your comments till now, and
filnaly I try to post for the first time.
As I'm now in abroad I haven't any books about Shinsengumi with me, so I
could give only limited informations, nevertheless I 'd like to contribute to your
research.
I mention also that I became a big fan of NHK drama "Shinsengumi " this year
and my interest in Shinsengumi increased.

Sincerely yours

Tama



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
